abstract: E'Dena Hines, actress related by marriage to Morgan Freeman, dies after she is found with multiple stab wounds outside her apartment in Washington Heights neighborhood of Manhattan; police take Hines' boyfriend, whose name has not yet been released, into custody.
lead_paragraph: E’Dena Hines, 33, who had a role in one of Mr. Freeman’s recent movies, was found in the street outside her Washington Heights apartment, the police said.

headline.main: Relative of Morgan Freeman Is Stabbed to Death in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Actor’s Relative Fatally Stabbed in Manhattan

snippet: E’Dena Hines, 33, who had a role in one of Mr. Freeman’s recent movies, was found in the street outside her Washington Heights apartment, the police said.
